mapper.select: select MERCHANT_ID merchantId, MERCHANT_CNAME merchantCname from merchant_x WHERE merchant_id = #{merchantId}
mapper.insert:
insert into MERCHANT_X
ACC_X_NAME,
ID_DEADLINE1,
ID_NO1,
ID_TYPE1,
MAN_NAME,
TYPE_YF,
CONTRACT_END_DATE,
MERCHANT_ID,
MERCHANT_CNAME,

MARKET_CONTACT_MOBILE,

FINANCIAL_CONTACT_MOBILE,
MERCHANT_DEPOSIT,
MERCHANT_AREA,
STORE_MANAGER,
MERCHANT_ADVISOR,
CREATE_DATE,
UPDATE_DATE,

mapper.update:
update MERCHANT_X
TYPE_YF = #{typeYf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAN_NAME = #{manName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_TYPE1 = #{idType1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ID_NO1 = #{idNo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_DEADLINE1 = #{idDeadline1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACC_X_NAME = #{accXName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_END_DATE = #{contractEndDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=CHAR},
MERCHANT_CNAME = #{merchantCname,jdbcType=CHAR},
ADDRESS_CHN = #{addressChn,jdbcType=CHAR},
RCV_NAME = #{rcvName,jdbcType=CHAR},
RCV_BANK = #{rcvBank,jdbcType=CHAR},
CONTRACT_START_DATE = #{contractStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_RENEWAL_DATE = #{contractRenewalDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_COMPANY_NAME = #{merchantCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RENEWAL_TYPE = #{renewalType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GUARANTEE_LAST_DATE = #{guaranteeLastDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GUARANTEE_AMT = #{guaranteeAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MARKET_CONTACT_PERSON = #{marketContactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKET_CONTACT_MOBILE = #{marketContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCIAL_CONTACT_PERSON = #{financialContactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCIAL_CONTACT_MOBILE = #{financialContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_DEPOSIT = #{merchantDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MERCHANT_AREA = #{merchantArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_MANAGER = #{storeManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_ADVISOR = #{merchantAdvisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=CHAR}
